# Assure & Analyze

By now, you've established your project equity and data management plans ([Plan & Prepare](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/equity-data-handbook/plan-prep/)) and you've finished assembling and tidying the data you plan on using for your project ([Collect & Process](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/equity-data-handbook/collect-process/)).

This phase of the data life cycle involves conducing your final data quality checks ([Quality Assurance](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/equity-data-handbook/assure-analyze/qaqc.html)) and beginning your analyses or product development steps ([Data Analysis](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/equity-data-handbook/assure-analyze/analysis.html), [Data Visualization](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/equity-data-handbook/assure-analyze/vis.html)). You might also review specific guidance on how to utilize [Demographics](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/equity-data-handbook/assure-analyze/demographics.html) or [CalEnviroScreen](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/equity-data-handbook/assure-analyze/calenviroscreen.html) data in your project.

Also see a [short list of best practices for this phase](https://cawaterboarddatacenter.github.io/equity-data-handbook/get-started/best-practice.html#assure-analyze).
